attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should not be allowed to have another job in addition to their position in the House of Commons. Being an MP should be a full time job for anyone. If they have another job working for a company in whatever capacity they are not devoting their time to what they should be doing – making this country a better place to live in. Saying that an MP does a full days work and only does extra in the evenings/weekends for another company is no excuse either. No one can work effectively under those conditions. Their wage is more than adequete to live on and does not need topping up. An MP being associated with a company is morally wrong and harms their constituency.
